briefTitle: Study of ProMetic BioTherapeutics Immune Globulin Intravenous (Human) 10%
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Open-Label Study of the Safety, Tolerability, Efficacy, and PK of ProMetic BioTherapeutics IGIV (Human) 10% in Adults and Children With Primary Immunodeficiency Diseases

arms.label: Gammargard, Gammaplex, Gamunex, or Octogam Treatment Period

summary: Phase 3 multicenter, open-label study of safety, tolerability, efficacy, and pharmacokinetics (PK) of ProMetic's Immune Globulin Intravenous (Human) 10%, the investigational medicinal product \[IMP\]), in Adults and Children with Primary Immunodeficiency Diseases (PIDD).

primaryOutcome.measure: Annual Rate of Occurrence of Serious Bacterial Infections (SBI)
